title: Online Course Design Process Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course developing online lecture design competencies by applying core principles of the ADDIE model in smartphone-dominant limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design online courses by applying the five stages (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation) of the ADDIE model.
Learners can specify science lecture objectives and content based on learner needs analysis.
Learners can design interactive elements (quizzes, discussion boards, etc.) considering smartphone-based learning environments.
Learners can propose course improvement plans reflecting peer feedback according to project-based assessment criteria.

resources: Standard Lecture Materials for Science Disciplines
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
